subtitle: This is an easy and effective way to jazz up turnips.

method.text: Cut the turnips into 6mm slices. Place in a roasting bag or casserole dish with the salted water. Cover and cook on 100% FULL power for 8-10 min until tender, shaking or stirring halfway through. Drain the turnips well.

Slice the onions into thin rings. Melt the butter on 100% FULL power for 1 - 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> min. Add the onions and toss over well. Cover and cook for 8 - 9 min on FULL power, stirring twice throughout.
Mix together the turnips and onions. Adjust seasoning and serve hot, sprinkled with a little extra ground black pepper.

title: Turnips with onions  - microwave
